name: FISH 3D GROWING AND EATING
description:
Hunt! Bizarre! Chaos! Feeding!

A game in which you can be a hunter and food. There are 37 fish in the game that you can play great with for a long time.
Your job is to eat as many fish as possible and grow bigger and bigger.

You can also see the chewing effects you eat with the fish. You can also swim faster which requires extra energy.

You can see the fish falling to pieces and you have to eat them. Very exciting.

Come test how much you are a survivor in the depths of the ocean.

How to play the game:

- Select the fish from the list
- Attack other fish and press the right bite button when you get close to the other fish and eat them. You get a rewards of gold
- Collect as much gold that you can take the fish in the main menu to which you would like

You can add the gold to the golden chambers.

Enjoy the game
